Hey Guys!

A quick plea for help here, it's been a long time since I last created a new album on Imgur, and they went and "improved" the site since then.

I have spent this last hour or more trying to figure out how to create a new album, but no luck.  It used to be so easy, just click on a button and up the new album popped, but not now!  So can someone help me out with this?

Thanks, everyone.

Go view your profile and there is the "new post" button on the top right corner

 

On mobile, view your profile and its the rectangle with the white check in it in the right hand corner.

I only use Imgur on my computer as that's where the images I upload are stored, so maybe its different on mobiles, but that green button doesn't actually let you create an album.

That's how to add more images unto the site, but I used to then create albums for individual collections of images, adding what I'd uploaded earlier.  This no longer seems to be available, or at least I can't figure out how to do it, any ideas?
